content.rendered:
A lightweight daily cream that brilliantly softens and hydrates skin, this blend of natural oils — avocado, macadamia, hazelnut, frankincense and sandalwood naturally packed with antioxidants Vitamins A, C and E — is supremely nourishing and calming.

Healing lavender and sweet orange balance sebum production for a brighter, more even skin tone. This non-greasy cooling moisturiser works throughout the day to firm, heal and refine the skin, as well as combat the harsh effects of daily shaving.

excerpt.rendered: A lightweight cream that brilliantly softens and nourishes the skin, and provides daily protection to combat dryness and irritation caused by shaving.
